title.narrative: ECI SERVICES

description.narrative: By 2020 national system of ECI services is enhanced, which contributes to Child Health, Early Childhood Development, Health Systems Strengthening. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 all children with disabilities (CWD) and special needs and their families receive adequate quality integrated services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020 national system of ECI services is enhanced

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the development of the 2021-2025 state programme “Health of nation and demographic security”, where provisions for strengthening the national ECI system was included and costed. The ECI service has standards on service delivery that includes stimulation and responsive caregiving, delivered through such interventions as nutrition, health, early stimulation and parenting. ECI service delivery has a direct connection to social protection and is linked to education. | Status:Met | As-of Date:20/01/2021
